amendment.description: To allow extended services Project SERV grants under part A of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to be available for violence prevention activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2232 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2232 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5103) To allow extended services Project SERV grants under part A of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to be available for violence prevention activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2232 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2232 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 2089.
